Goodnight -you jerks- my -only- pals -which makes my life look sad in comparison-.
Also, I had a dream once that every President of USA has a thing called a "President Button" that is made without reason but with random effect.

Obama's would make a cookie instantly.
Washington's would make a barrel of explosives go off for no reason.
Lincoln's would make his top hat expand until he can fit in it.
Kennedy's would kill a random person.
